title: Feature Request: SPICE protocol
author: scardella
body_snippet:
I'd love to be able to use mRemoteNG to handle libvirt/QEMU SPICE protocol.  That would allow connections to libvirt/QEMU VMs even if there was some reason that networking was not working within the VM.  OS installs, upgrades, etc.  Oddball OSes that you don't know whether there's remote access.  Or, diagnosing networking issues in the VM.

It seems like it would slot in well with the mRemoteNG's ethos.

comments.snippet: I agree that it would be nice, however at least in windows the standalone SPICE installer is 80Mb thats a lot to add to the total size of mRemoteNG for one protocol.   have your tried to install it and get it to work with external tools?  if so can you share how you have it setup?
